message: I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product, and I believe it's worth considering at a price of $12,000. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a unique item that will bring significant value to your business.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm not willing to pay $12,000. I'm willing to consider a price closer to $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value.

I understand that you're looking to make a fair deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $9,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product at $11,000. This is a compromise that I think is reasonable considering the value the product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, which would be $9,500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go up to $9,500. I'm willing to make one more compromise and offer the product at $11,500. This is as high as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a fair price considering the value the product brings.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Bob, but I'm not willing to go up to $12,250. I'm willing to make one more compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'll offer the product to you at $12,750. This is as high as I'm willing to go, and I hope we can finally come to an agreement.
